name: FANG
description:
A incredibly difficult NES style game. Throw your axe watch it bounce off the wall and kill some enemies then catch it and redirect it. The more axes you carry the slower you move. You can find lost souls for extra lives and FANG keys to open doors.

Controls:

LMB to throw axe

Space to Clear 1 axe

wasd / arrow keys to move

TAB to switch music mode (Retro, orchestral, Combined, off)

/ to open map
